content: This is the FHIR Developer Days 2016 channel for the Clinical Decision Support track.
Looking forward to this track! Any requests from potential participants on areas of focus?
For the CDS track we'll be focusing on an approach to delivering guidelines using the CDC All Hazards Approach using Zika Virus management and reporting as the use case.
Here's the CDC's page for the most current information on Zika Virus: http://www.cdc.gov/zika/index.html
Prime Dimensions has agreed to let us use their demo implementation of the use case here: http://demo.primedimensions.com
This is the same demonstration that was run as part of the CDS Hooks track at last connectathon in Baltimore.

I've uploaded all the artifacts for the simplified Zika Workflow to an HSPC DSTU3 Sandbox. Links to all the resources are here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/15a-tm7eNc9kW48Lo1IkL2jLJPJ24li6lH6vVTpcRYuE/edit?usp=sharing
